Name: Brian Fischer
Title: President
About:
As the founder of Smashing Boxes, I have consulted with and developed innovative technology solutions for numerous large companies around the country including: Cisco, Sony, Red Hat, Duke, UNC, Malaria No More, Quintiles and many others. I have years of experience in software and product solutions, particularly in the analysis, planning, design, and implementation of large-scale solutions. My current focus is working with clients to identify opportunities within their organizations for high ROI technology solutions.

I'm a North Carolina native, growing up in Apex. After high school I stayed close by and attended NC State University, but left after a semester to attend an art school where I studied Graphic Design and Multimedia. After two years diving into the graphic design world I left to pursue another passion and went on staff with Young Life in Raleigh, NC.After four amazing years on the Young Life staff, I felt the creative industry pulling me back, and took a position as the Creative Director at a large corporation in Charlotte, NC. Still possessing that entrepreneurial bug and seeing opportunity everywhere, I started my own company in 2008 as a design and web consultant for small businesses. After collaborating with SB cofounder Nick Jordan on a few projects, we started Smashing Boxes in 2010.

We have two amazing kids, my six-year-old son named Oak and three-year-old daughter Lawson.
